title: Fly Emirates Font
content:
Hi there   
   
I was wondering if anyone in here could identify this font for me?   
   
Kind Regards   
   
Jake ![Fly Emirates](http://web.archive.org/web/20141119111431im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20551.jpg)
author: jake_hikky

comments.content:
It reminds me of the work of Jos Buivenga.  
 [http://www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141119111431/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/ "http://www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/")
It's called EK and is the custom-designed in-house font of Emirates Airline.
